discounts_dates_check.name: discounts_dates_check
discounts_dates_check.value: ends_at IS NULL OR ends_at > starts_at

discounts_value_check.name: discounts_value_check
discounts_value_check.value:
(type IN ('free_shipping', 'buy_x_get_y')) OR 
      (type IN ('percentage', 'fixed_amount') AND value IS NOT NULL)

product_variants_compare_at_price_check.name: product_variants_compare_at_price_check
product_variants_compare_at_price_check.value: compare_at_price IS NULL OR compare_at_price >= selling_price

products_compare_at_price_check.name: products_compare_at_price_check
products_compare_at_price_check.value: compare_at_price IS NULL OR compare_at_price >= selling_price
